TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomPeerResolverService extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract

[<System.Obsolete("PeerChannel feature is obsolete and will be removed in the future.", false)>]

summary.span: 提供自定义对等解析程序服务的基本实现。

span.span: Provides a basic implementation of a custom peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不但可以定义自定义对等解析程序服务的基本实现，同时还可以查找注册 ID 到此解析程序所维护的网络中的对等终结点地址的解析。The class defines the base implementation of a custom peer resolver service and provides lookup for the resolution of registration IDs to peer endpoint addresses within the mesh maintained by this resolver.

para.span: 应该从此类派生自定义对等解析程序的实施者，还应该重写这些实施者要为其提供自定义实现的特定功能。

span.span: Implementers of custom peer resolvers should derive from this class and override those specific functions for which they are providing custom implementations.

para.span: 所有自定义解析程序都必须最小程度地实现 接口。

span.span: Any custom peer resolver must minimally implement the interface.

para.span: 同时，使用自定义解析程序的客户端必须要有客户端-服务器延迟上限，以便能利用对等解析程序服务成功刷新其注册。

span.span: Also, clients using a custom resolver must have some upper bound on client-server latency in order to successfully refresh their registration with the peer resolver service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置循环时间长度，过了此时间间隔后，无效项将会被从对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中删除。

span.span: Gets or sets the recurring length of time after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

value.span: 指定时间间隔的 ，过了此时间间隔后，无效项将会被从对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中删除。

span.span: that specifies the time interval after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在执行对等解析程序服务之前设置此属性，且此属性不能为零。This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. 默认间隔为 1 分钟。The default interval is 1 minute. 此值必须小于 ，以避免对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中出现无效项。This value must be less than the value of to avoid the occurrence of stale entries in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

exception.span: 该时间间隔既可为零，也可大于 。

span.span: The interval is either zero or greater than .

exception.span: 在调用 后，尝试设置该属性。

span.span: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to .

span.span: Closes the peer resolver service.

summary.span: 打开对等解析程序服务。

span.span: Opens the peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当被调用时，此方法会根据 属性的设置值来安排第一次注册查找表清除。When this method is called, it schedules the first registration lookup table cleanup based on the value set for the property.

span.span: or are set to a time span interval of 0.

span.span: The service has been started by a previous call to this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshResponseInfo Refresh(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo refreshInfo) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Refresh (refreshInfo As RefreshInfo) As RefreshResponseInfo

param.name: refreshInfo
param.span: 包含项的网络 ID 和注册 ID 的 对象，该项为对等解析程序注册查找表中的要刷新的项。

span.span: object that contains the mesh ID and the registration ID of the entry to refresh in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

summary.span: 刷新对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中的项的过期时间。

span.span: Refreshes the expiry of an entry in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

returns.span: 包含新刷新的注册项的 。

span.span: that contains the newly refreshed registration entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刷新项可以延长项的有效期的时间长度。A refresh of an entry extends the length of time for which it remains valid. 必须在提供给此方法的 对象中提供唯一标识项时要用到的所有信息。All information used to uniquely identify the entry must be supplied in the object supplied to this method.

exception.span: 可以设置为 null。

span.span: is set to null.

exception.span: 的以前调用没有启动自定义对等解析程序服务。

span.span: The custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置时间长度，在此时间段内，项将在对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中有效。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

value.span: 指定时间长度的 ，在此时间段内，项将在对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中有效。

span.span: that specifies the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须在执行对等解析程序服务之前设置此属性，且此属性不能为零。This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. 默认时间间隔为 2 分钟。The default interval is 2 minutes. 对于对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中的给定项，当提供给此属性的时间段结束以后，该项将会被标记，以便删除。When the amount of time supplied to this property has passed for a given entry in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table, that entry is marked for deletion. 当 属性中所指定的时间间隔结束以后，就会执行删除操作。The delete occurs when interval specified in the property occurs. 例如，如果将此属性设置为 10 分钟，则注册查找表中的项将会在该时间间隔后，变为无效，且会被标记，以便删除。For example, if this property is set to a timespan of 10 minutes, entries in the registration lookup table will become stale and marked for deletion after the interval has passed. 因此，对等解析程序客户端必须每十分钟进行一次更新，以避免其项被删除。As a result, the peer resolver client must update every ten minutes to avoid having their entry deleted.

exception.span: 该时间间隔既可为零，也可大于 。

span.span: The interval is either zero or greater than .

exception.span: 在调用 后，尝试设置该属性。

span.span: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to .

summary.span: 利用自定义对等解析程序服务注册对等节点。

span.span: Registers a peer with the custom peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在特定网络中注册对等节点，则必须向此方法的一个重载提供格式正确的 对象。To register a peer node in a specific mesh, a correctly-formed object must be supplied to one of the overloads for this method. 此对象包含有注册发出注册请求的注册项时所必须用到的特定详细信息，其中包括一个唯一标识该注册项的 GUID、网络 ID 和一个终结点地址。This object contains the specific details necessary to register the registration entry requesting registration, including a GUID that uniquely identifies the registration entry, the mesh ID, and an endpoint address.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo Register(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo registerInfo) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Register (registerInfo As RegisterInfo) As RegisterResponseInfo

param.name: registerInfo
param.span: 包含要利用对等解析程序服务进行注册的注册项的相关信息的 。

span.span: that contains information about the registration entry to register with the peer resolver service.

summary.span: 向对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中添加新项。

span.span: Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

returns.span: 包含添加到对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中的项的复本的 。

span.span: that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可向对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中添加新项。This method adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service. 注意，此服务关闭之后所进行的注册是无效的 -- 解析请求不会返回这些项。Note that registrations made after the service is closed have no effect -- these entries are not returned by resolve requests.

exception.span: 查找表中已经存在使用相同 GUID 的注册项，或者以前对 的调用没有启动自定义对等解析程序服务。

span.span: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .

exception.span: 提供给此方法的 对象为空或格式不正确。

span.span: The object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.

exception.span: 提供给 参数的对象的 AddressInfo 属性为空。

span.span: The AddressInfo property of the object supplied to the parameter was null.

exception.span: 提供给此方法的 值可设置为空。

span.span: The value supplied to this method is set to null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo Resolve(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo resolveInfo) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Resolve (resolveInfo As ResolveInfo) As ResolveResponseInfo

param.name: resolveInfo
param.span: 包含注册项的相关信息的 ，该注册项的终结点（如果已知）为对等解析程序服务要查找的终结点。

span.span: that contains information on the registration entry for which endpoints, if known, are to be looked up by the peer resolver service.

summary.span: 返回注册项的未知终结点的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of known endpoints for a registration entry.

returns.span: 包含查找表中的注册项的终结点的 ，该注册项与 参数中所提供的信息相匹配。

span.span: that contains the endpoints for the registration entry in the lookup table that matches the information supplied in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以根据 对象中所提供的数据查找注册项，并会返回在对等解析程序服务的注册查找表中找到的所有相应终结点地址。This method looks up a registration entry based on the data supplied in a object and returns any corresponding endpoint addresses found in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table. 返回的终结点地址的数目将少于或等于 对象上所设置的 属性的值。The number of endpoint addresses returned is equal to or less than the value of the property set on the object.

exception.span: 对象为空，或格式不正确。

span.span: The object is null or is not correctly formed.

exception.span: 查找表中已经存在使用相同 GUID 的注册项，或者以前对 的调用没有启动自定义对等解析程序服务。

span.span: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .
